name: Cannibals
description:
A father tells his little daughter a story about cannibals he met in his youth. Recalling past events, he tells that a family of cannibals was operating in the local forestry exactly at the time when he was appointed senior detective of the district. After the first meeting with the cannibals, when the father barely survived, law enforcement agencies decided to clean up the territory.
The police took a detective with them for quick orientation on the ground and arrived at the maniac lair to put an end to the bloody atrocities of the cannibals. But, according to the father, this was just the beginning, so the daughter will have a sleepless night after such a story ...

In the game you will:
- Feel the whole gloomy and chilling atmosphere of the events that took place in the life of his father - Richard Hoffman;
- Learn an interesting but confusing plot;
- Complete many interesting quests;
- Constantly encounter bloodthirsty cannibals and elude their tenacious paws;
- Solve a variety of puzzles, moving step by step to salvation;
- Solve the riddle of Paley the pig lying on the couch during the story;
- Look at the ongoing events through the eyes of the captives who have been there before;
__________________________________________

And the most important thing! Remember... that history is controlled... by you!
Be prepared that your daughter will not be satisfied with any development of events and you, sometimes, will have to retell the story again.
